work.name: Weborama
work.summary: Machine‑learning engineer working on contextual targeting (WeboMind) and AutoML data pipelines.
highlights: Built a contextual URL‑recommendation tool: crawled web pages, generated embeddings, optimised FAISS search and stored vectors in Milvus.
Created clustering module for campaign insights and deployed the service to production.
Designed data‑engineering pipeline to predict user conversion rate: optimised SQL extraction, orchestrated ETL & model inference with Airflow, monitored via Prometheus/Grafana.

work.name: ArianeGroup Defense & Space
work.summary: Research & development of algorithms for autonomous flight‑neutralisation systems.
highlights: Surveyed state‑of‑the‑art solutions for in‑flight launcher neutralisation.
Applied statistical geometry to improve computation of neutralisation timing.
Developed 3‑D trajectory algorithm estimating time‑to‑neutralisation under perturbed flight paths.
